title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: tied resist patterning in weft (ikat) on plain weave; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Long and narrow textile, probably a breast cloth (kemben), in red with green, purple, orange, and yellow. Borders fringed and heavily brocaded. Center design shows diamond-shaped lattice pattern with brocaded geometric florals.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: silk
Technique: tied resist patterning in weft (ikat) on plain weave; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). 1961-115-5.
